name: Password Pad Document
summary: Learn about .PWDP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Each Password Pad document is encrypted using the password given for that document. Therefore, the password for one file may not be the same as the password for another file.
NOTE: Password Pad is only available on the Mac App Store.

description: Password-protected text document created by Password Pad, a text editor used for securing documents; locks the document text using a password and encrypts the contents so that the document can only be viewed by entering the password; used for saving personal information such as credit card numbers, website passwords, and diary entries.
